thread.section_title: LilySilk Bedding Store Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of LilySilk Bedding Store | lilysilk.com
thread.title: Dex B.
thread.title_full: LilySilk Bedding Store reviewed by Dex B.

author: Dex B.
title: Dex B.
text: Purchased our first bed set from lilysilk and me and my partner are in love with the products. So comfy that I'm always looking forward to being in our bed each night. Some nights we remind ourselves how we are so glad we got them. Will return to lilysilks website for more items! :)
